quote: When I was small I dreamed of demons. I thought they were under my bed, but you said, it can't be so, you don't get demons our side of the river, the guards won't let them over London Bridge.
quote_letters: WHEN I WAS SMALL I DREAMED OF DEMONS I THOUGHT THEY WERE UNDER MY BED BUT YOU SAID IT CANT BE SO YOU DONT GET DEMONS OUR SIDE OF THE RIVER THE GUARDS WONT LET THEM OVER LONDON BRIDGE
